## The FreesearchR app

The FreesearchR app is published as an R-package for easy installation in a local R-environment and is also accessible [directly online in your web browser](https://app.freesearchr.org/).

Currently, the app introduction lives in the package documentation and [is accessible here](https://docs.freesearchr.org).
